text: TicketCity | Full Stack Developer and Developer Lead | Austin, TX | Onsite https://www.ticketcity.com/ We are an eCommerce marketplace for live events (sports, concerts, theater). If you get sh*t done and love working on a close-knit dev team, we want you! Our stack: Javascript, jQuery, React, MS-SQL, ElasticSearch, Node.js, .NET https://www.ticketcity.com/careers-at-ticketcity.html Feel free to email me (Caitlin) at csullivan@ticketcity.com to learn more about the roles, the Dev team or life at as a TicketCitizen!
